encoding.description: The encoding used for `content`. Currently, `"utf-8"` and `"base64"` are supported.

gist-comment.title: Gist Comment
gist-comment.description: A comment made to a gist.

encoding.description: The encoding used for `content`. Currently, `"utf-8"` and `"base64"` are supported.

validation_failed.description: Validation failed, or the endpoint has been spammed.

since.name: since
since.description: Only show results that were last updated after the given time. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

per-page.name: per_page
per-page.description: The number of results per page (max 100). For more information, see "[Using pagination in the REST API](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-cloud@latest//rest/using-the-rest-api/using-pagination-in-the-rest-api)."

page.name: page
page.description: The page number of the results to fetch. For more information, see "[Using pagination in the REST API](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-cloud@latest//rest/using-the-rest-api/using-pagination-in-the-rest-api)."

gist-id.name: gist_id
gist-id.description: The unique identifier of the gist.

comment-id.name: comment_id
comment-id.description: The unique identifier of the comment.
